A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars The Last Jedi is the next installment in the Star Wars franchise. Rian Johnson in my opinion had delivered one of the best Star Wars film since Empire Strikes Back. But\, there are flaws. There are certain things that I liked and things I don't liked. The things that I don't liked is the Finn and Rose story line. It felt like it's a complete different movie. The things that i like is the action sequences\, Space battle and the story overall. This is a completely different Star Wars movie\, yeah there is certain elements which is similar to the original trilogy\, but it no big deal. Overall this is movie is a ton of fun. I had a total blast watching from start to finish.
